metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7946 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: X.org libXi before 1.7.7 allows remote X servers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via vectors involving length fields.

notes.Note: sbeattie> same commit as CVE-2016-7945 mdeslaur> possible regression: https://bugs.freedesktop.org/show_bug.cgi?id=98204

criterions.comment: libxi package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:1.7.8-1').
